com.salesforce.androidsdk.ui

Class ServerPickerActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • AppCompatActivity
      • com.salesforce.androidsdk.ui.ServerPickerActivity

  • public class ServerPickerActivity
extends AppCompatActivity
    This class provides UI to change the login server URL to use during an OAuth flow. The user can add a number of custom servers, or switch between the list of existing servers in the list.
    Author:
    bhariharan
